name: Smart Golf Scorecard for WordPress
author: Jerry Shkavritko

sections.description: This plugin enables your site to displays top 100 rounds for a given golf course. This data comes from smartgolfscorecard.com
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload smartgolfscorecard.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place [smartgolfscorecard course_id=] with a valid course_id in any content area
sections.faq:
Where do I get the course_id from?

To get your golf course id you will need to navigate to you course profile on smartgolfscorecard.com. You can do so by
searching for your course via http://smartgolfscorecard.com/courses/search/ and then click on the course name link. In the
address bar you will see the following “http://smartgolfscorecard.com/club/34/” the last part (number) of the URL is the course_id.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release.

1.1

  • Provided better error handling when no rounds are available for a selected course

short_description: This plugin enables you to showcase players scorecards (leaderboard) from smartgolfscorecard.com for your golf course.
description: This plugin enables your site to displays top 100 rounds for a given golf course. This data comes from smartgolfscorecard.com
